article.para: The purpose of this document is to describe how to install an Ulteo OVD Gateway on @distrib_pretty_name@.

listitem.para: An Internet connection that provides HTTP access to install @distrib_name@ packages.
An Ulteo OVD Session Manager and Application Server installed and configured.

important.para: The Gateway Server has to be a dedicated system for Ulteo OVD usage. It may also host another Ulteo OVD server role. However, if multiple roles are installed on the same system, Ulteo does not guarantee the system will work correctly.

listitem.para: Evaluations/POCs: Minimum prerequisites are 1 CPU core and 1GB RAM
Production environments: Ulteo recommends a minimum of 2GB RAM and 2 CPU cores

section.para: The first step is to configure yum to enable the Ulteo rpm repository. Create the file /etc/yum.repos.d/ovd.repo with:
section.screen:
[ovd-@VERSIONNOTILD@] name=Ulteo OVD @VERSION@ baseurl=@BASE_URI@/@distrib_name@/@distrib_version@/ enabled=1 gpgcheck=1 gpgkey=@BASE_URI@/rhel/@distrib_version@/keyring]]
[ovd-@VERSIONNOTILD@-@GOLD_NAME@] name=Ulteo OVD @VERSION@-@GOLD_NAME@ baseurl=@BASE_URI@/@GOLD_NAME@/@distrib_name@/@distrib_version@/ enabled=1 gpgcheck=1 gpgkey=@BASE_URI@/rhel/@distrib_version@/keyring

section.title: Packages Installation

listitem.para: The only installation data required is the host/IP address of the Session Manager. (We use here as an example, but of course, you have to specify your own domain name).

section.para: The configuration is now done. The service should be started at the end of the installation and you should see the server appear in the unregistered server page of your Session Manager.

section.title: Web Portal Configuration
section.para: For security reasons, the Gateway doesn't allow communication to the Web Portal by default. If you want to provide access to the Web Portal via the Gateway, you have to change the default configuration.
Edit the slaveserver.conf file in /etc/ulteo/ovd/slaveserver.conf and change this line:

You have to uncomment the variable and set the value to the URL of your Web Portal. For example:
web_client = http://webportal.test.demo/

Now, restart the slaverserver service.
# /etc/init.d/ulteo-ovd-slaveserver restart
